content:
Is available in draft form https://hl7-uk.github.io/UK-STU3/

Latest change.
Added ConceptMaps.
This guide existing resources but some have been changed to ensure they work with validation. Issues can be recorded here https://github.com/HL7-UK/UK-STU3/issues
(that may change but it works for now)

This implementation guide has moved to https://interopen.github.io/careconnect-base-stu3/

Majority of the profiles and resources have now been fixed, although a few ValueSets still have SNOMED ecl issues (they can't be resolved using an ontology server).

This IG can be used with with the HL7 FHIR Validator to test resources.
